      • showCompanyList

        public static void showCompanyList(java.lang.String name,
                   int ID)
        Displays single element of a list of companies in two columns. The first one with ID, and second one with its name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of a company to display
        ID - the ID of a company to display.

      • orderEnteringCompanyID

      • showMaterialList

        public static void showMaterialList(java.lang.String materialName,
                    int id,
                    int companyID)
        Displays single element of a list of materials in three columns.
        Parameters:
        materialName - string containing the name of a material
        id - int containing the ID of a material
        companyID - int containing the ID of a company owning the material

      • printMaterialDetails

        public static void printMaterialDetails(java.lang.String details)
        Displays info about a material: its name, ID, id of the owning company, details, notes, supplier, price and currency. Info is displayed in following pattern:
        The name of a parameter: the value of a parameter.
        Parameters:
        details - formatted string with all info about a material

      • orderEnteringMaterialID

        public static void orderEnteringMaterialID()
        Displays Please enter material I message.

      • showExceptionMessage

        public static void showExceptionMessage(java.lang.String error)
        Displays info about a thrown exception.
        Parameters:
        error - the return value of getMessage() method from any exception.
